subject: Re: [junit] How to run JUNIT Test suite from ANT
msgSnippet: Satheesh, There is some good documentation if you Google for junit ant .  Can you be more specific about what you re trying, and what s happening in response?
messageBody:
Satheesh,

There is some good documentation if you Google for "junit ant". Can
you be more specific about what you're trying, and what's happening in
response? Thanks,

David Saff

On Tue, Feb 22, 2011 at 1:26 AM, Satheesh Jayabalan
<satheesh.jey@...> wrote:
> Hi All,
>

>

> with Ant .
